title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 921-7.6 - Distribution of back pay
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 921-7.6 - Distribution of back pay

State Regulations

The commissioner shall distribute to all employees entitled
to notice under the Act and this Part any back pay and the value of any
benefits recovered from an employer who did not provide such
notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
921-7.6

Amended

New

York State Register June 21, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 25, eff. 6/21/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
